author: sdeboy
msg: Attempting to set tab layout policy using reflection to 'scroll_tab_layout' (method available as of 1.4 - reflection used in order to maintain compatibility with 1.3 VMs)

author: sdeboy
msg: Minor change to how jeditorpane's text is updated

author: sdeboy
msg: - added 'create tab from expression' feature available via view menu - define an expression and all existing events as well as new events which match the expression will be routed to this tab (other tabs for which this event matches -the tab created because of the matching identifier expression- will also receive the event)
- moved sort methods out of eventcontainer and into sort table model

author: sdeboy
msg: reverting LogUI receiver panel visibility change - incorrect setdividerlocation logic

author: sdeboy
msg: receiver panel defaulting to not displayed no longer showing one touch buttons on startup
